snippet: South Korea reiterated on Tuesday its demand that China investigate allegations by a South Korean activist that he was tortured by Chinese security officers.
abstract: South Korea reiterates its demand that China investigate accusations by activist Kim Young-hwan that he was tortured by Chinese security officers, ratcheting up pressure in a case that has already caused tensions.
lead_paragraph: South Korea reiterated on Tuesday its demand that China investigate allegations by a South Korean activist that he was tortured by Chinese security officers.

headline.seo: South Korea Demands Chinese Response to Torture Accusation
headline.main: South Korea Repeats Call to Investigate Torture Claim
headline.print_headline: South Korea Repeats Call To Investigate Torture Claim

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
